PERSONA:
robert is a 58-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area on the pacific coast of the united states. he was born and raised in the u.s. and has some college education but no degree. robert is a devout protestant christian, attending religious services more than once a week. he identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian, and his religious beliefs shape his conservative political ideology.

despite being registered as an independent voter, robert leans towards the republican party and holds conservative views on most issues. his family income falls in the middle-income range of $50,000 to $60,000 per year. robert is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day, but he does not engage in any regular volunteer work.

overall, robert is a middle-aged, middle-class man with a strong religious and conservative outlook on life. he values his faith, family, and traditional values, and his political views align with the republican party's platform. while not affluent, robert's stable income and metropolitan lifestyle allow him to live comfortably and stay connected through frequent internet use.
